Steve Ballmer said that with about 1,000 apps at launch, Microsoft is ahead of its competitors in their marketplace launch phases.

year By Jeff McLane INQUIRER STAFF WRITER DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party and named the Eagles quarterback comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. "They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents."
